chinese: 舟覆乃见善游,马奔乃见良御
pinyin: zhōu fù nǎi jiàn shàn yóu, mǎ bēn nǎi jiàn liáng yù
description: Literally: 'Only when the boat capsizes do you see the good swimmer.'

examples.chinese: 舟覆乃见善游,马奔乃见良御,拥有什么样的人生,完全靠自己的实力来决定
examples.translation: ...what kind of life you have depends entirely on your own strength

examples.chinese: 平时是每不出每个人潜在的差别的,舟覆乃见善游,马奔乃见良御
examples.translation: Ordinarily differences are hidden, but crisis reveals talent
